title: Where To Go For Hair Removal In Hong Kong: Waxing, Laser Hair Removal And More
author: Jianne Soriano
description: Tired of the hassle of shaving? Head to one of these hair removal salons that offer waxing, threading, laser and IPL.
cleaned_text: Tired of the hassle of shaving? Head to one of these hair removal salons that offer waxing, threading, laser and IPL We know how much effort and endless maintenance it takes to shave so we can achieve fuzz-free [skin](https://hk.asiatatler.com/style/how-to-exfoliate-your-face-dr-barbara-sturm-beauty-tips). So, why not opt to visit a [hair](https://hk.asiatatler.com/style/how-to-care-for-asian-hair-humidity-andrea-clark-trichologist) removal [salon](https://hk.asiatatler.com/life/luxury-hair-salons-in-hong-kong) instead? Hong Kong has a plethora of salons that offer all kinds of hair removal treatments, from waxing to threading and even more permanent methods such as laser and IPL. Unsure where to go or just looking for your next go-to salon? We're breaking down the best salons in Hong Kong that cater to all your hair removal needs, whether you're on a budget or looking for a specific treatment. See also: [9 Luxurious Hair Salons In Hong Kong For Your Next Haircut](https://hk.asiatatler.com/life/luxury-hair-salons-in-hong-kong) 1. The Skin Gym [The Skin Gym](https://www.theskingym.com.hk/) focuses on skincare overall, providing an array of services such as corrective and [anti-ageing](https://hk.asiatatler.com/style/botox-alternatives-anti-ageing) facials, infrared sauna, spray tan and so on. But they also have a lot of hair removal services, whether you're looking for permanent hair removals or temporary ones. Their expert team of beauticians boast years of experience in the industry, each specialises in certain areas. Clara Ng is the expert in IPL hair and vein removal while Josie Coro is more skilled in waxing. Hair removal services: IPL, laser, wax and thread The Skin Gym, The Centrium, 21/F, Room 6, 60 Wyndham Street,
